summary: With a ticking bomb locked to his neck, a young freerunner races against the clock and all types of baddies to get from one end of the city to the other to save himself and his girlfriend.
cast: Sean Faris|Tamer Hassan|Rebecca Da Costa|Danny Dyer|Seymour Cassel|Amanda Fuller|Dylan W. Baker|John Bernecker|Ryan Doyle|Justin Ganguly|Jacob Kabel|Tony Vo|Joe Nin Williams|Joe Zamora|Jimmie Lee Williams|Warren Ostergard|David Grovic|Mariah Bonner|Casey Durkin|Jim Boeven|Josh Cruze|Phillip DeVona|Hidekun Hah|Grigor Pankov|James Quattrochi|Curtis Taylor|Faradj Vaziri|Erica Stikeleather|Kathie Dice|Ray Goodwin|Shane Daniels|Luci Romberg|Caine Sinclair|Todd Maurer|Lawrence Silverstein|Jasper Wood|Vahid Jafroodi|Julio Leal|Ace Underhill|Jia Mae|R.T. Steckel|Jason Botsford|Stephen R. Campanella|Jennifer James Davies|Richard Fike|Sara Fike|Bart Flynn|Grace Gentiluomo|Holly Neelie|Russ Smith|Michael Vehar|Patrick Ziska
title: Freerunner
